title: Circle of the Land
content:
Choose Level 4 Circle Spells (Arctic, Coast, Desert, Forest, Grassland, Mountain, Swamp, Underdark) (Class Feature) +1 Natural Recovery Charge

Choose Level 5 Circle Spells (Arctic, Coast, Desert, Forest, Grassland, Mountain, Swamp, Underdark) (Class Feature) +1 Natural Recovery Charge

Nature's Ward (Class Feature)

+1 Natural Recovery Charge

BG3 Circle of the Land Prepared Spells

At level 3, 5, 7 and 9 you can select one druid circle to obtain their spells. These spells are always prepared.
